_comment: Pterodactyl Egg - Subnautica Nitrox Server (by NibNab)
name: Subnautica Nitrox Server
author: NibNab <nibnab@unified.net>
description: Installs and runs the Nitrox multiplayer mod for Subnautica inside a .NET 9 container. Automatically installs Subnautica via SteamCMD and configures Nitrox for multiplayer use.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

# Install dependencies for curl & certificates
apt update -y && apt install -y curl ca-certificates unzip

# Download and execute the latest Nitrox installer from GitHub
cd /home/container
SCRIPT_URL="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NibNabbb/nitrox-ptero-test/refs/heads/main/install.sh"
echo "ðŸ“¥ Downloading Nitrox installer from GitHub..."
curl -fsSL "$SCRIPT_URL" -o install.sh
chmod +x install.sh

# Run installer
bash install.sh

# Cleanup
rm -f install.sh

echo
 echo "âœ… Nitrox installation complete!"
 echo "You can start the server with ./nitrox/start.sh"

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: Port the Nitrox server will listen on (UDP).

variables.name: Steam Username
variables.description: Steam account username used for Subnautica installation via SteamCMD.

variables.name: Steam Password
variables.description: Steam account password used for Subnautica installation via SteamCMD.

variables.name: Steam Guard Code
variables.description: Optional Steam Guard code if your account requires two-factor authentication.

variables.name: Subnautica Path
variables.description: Path to install Subnautica game files inside the container.
